description: A head of cabbage in a large pot of boiling water

content: "Boil a pot of water, then soften a cabbage head in it for 5-7 minutes. Remove and let cool."

description: Bowl of mixed ground beef, rice, onion, garlic, and spices

content: "Combine ground beef, rice, onion, garlic, spices to make the stuffing mixture for the cabbage rolls."

description: Cabbage leaf being filled with the beef mixture

content: "Carefully fill cabbage leaves with the beef mixture, then roll them up ensuring the sides are tucked in."

description: Cabbage rolls placed in a pot with tomato sauce and diced tomatoes

content: "Place cabbage rolls in a pot, pour over tomato sauce, diced tomatoes, season, then cover and simmer for 45-60 minutes."

description: Delicious stuffed cabbage rolls ready to be served

content: "After simmering, serve hot, and enjoy your delectable stuffed cabbage rolls!"
